mapper.select: SELECT resume_id, title, member_id FROM TB_ONLINE_RESUME WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_ONLINE_RESUME SET title = #{resumeDto.title}, industry_id = #{resumeDto.industryId}, military = #{resumeDto.military}, intro = #{resumeDto.intro} WHERE resume_id = #{resumeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CAREER ( resume_id, company_name, entry_date, resignation_date, task, position, description ) VALUES ( #{resumeId}, #{career.companyName}, #{career.entryDate}, #{career.resignationDate}, #{career.task}, #{career.position}, #{career.description} )

INSERT INTO TB_EDUCATION ( resume_id, education_type, school_name, entry_date, graduation_date, major, status ) VALUES ( #{resumeId}, #{education.educationType}, #{education.schoolName}, #{education.entryDate}, #{education.graduationDate}, #{education.major}, #{education.status} )

INSERT INTO TB_CERTIFICATION ( resume_id, certification_name, get_date, organization ) VALUES ( #{resumeId}, #{certification.certificationName}, #{certification.getDate}, #{certification.organization} )
INSERT INTO TB_WORK_CONDITION (resume_id, salary, employment_type) VALUES (#{resumeId}, #{workCondition.salary}, #{workCondition.employmentType})
mapper.select: SELECT r.resume_id, r.member_id, r.title, r.military, r.intro, r.industry_id, wc.work_condition_id, wc.salary, wc.employment_type, ca.career_id, ca.company_name, ca.entry_date, ca.resignation_date, ca.task, ca.description, ca.position, ed.education_id, ed.school_name, ed.major, ed.entry_date, ed.graduation_date, ed.education_type, ed.status, crt.certification_id, crt.certification_name, crt.get_date, crt.organization, wa.work_area_id, wa.hoped_work_area FROM TB_ONLINE_RESUME r LEFT JOIN TB_CAREER ca ON r.resume_id = ca.resume_id LEFT JOIN TB_EDUCATION ed ON r.resume_id = ed.resume_id LEFT JOIN TB_CERTIFICATION crt ON r.resume_id = crt.resume_id LEFT JOIN TB_WORK_AREA wa ON r.resume_id = wa.resume_id LEFT JOIN TB_WORK_CONDITION wc ON r.resume_id = wc.resume_id WHERE r.resume_id = #{resumeId};
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_ONLINE_RESUME SET title = #{title}, industry_id = #{industryId}, military = #{military}, intro = #{intro}, last_updated = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') WHERE resume_id = #{resumeId} AND member_id = #{memberId}

UPDATE TB_CAREER SET company_name = #{companyName}, entry_date = #{entryDate}, resignation_date = #{resignationDate}, task = #{task}, position = #{position}, description = #{description} WHERE resume_id = #{resumeId} AND career_id = #{careerId}

UPDATE TB_EDUCATION SET education_type = #{educationType}, school_name = #{schoolName}, entry_date = #{entryDate}, graduation_date = #{graduationDate}, major = #{major}, status = #{status} WHERE resume_id = #{resumeId} AND education_id = #{educationId}
UPDATE TB_CERTIFICATION SET certification_name = #{certificationName}, get_date = #{getDate}, organization = #{organization} WHERE resume_id = #{resumeId} AND certification_id = #{certificationId}
UPDATE TB_WORK_CONDITION SET salary = #{salary}, employment_type = #{employmentType} WHERE resume_id = #{resumeId} AND work_condition_id = #{workConditionId}
